short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GitHub Reactions allows you to extract reactions from issues to better understand which issues are the most popular

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GitHub Reactions extension extracts reactions from the particular issues using GitHub API and adds them to the issue titles in the issues list. It could be useful in synergy with sorting options like sort by reactions (thumbs up/thumbs down). So you may easily find the most wanted feature to implement next.
